BugInstance.message: it.superbudget.ShutdownHook.run() may fail to close Connection
Exception is caught when Exception is not thrown in it.superbudget.SuperBudget.getMonitoredVMs(int)
The class name it.superbudget.jfcExample doesn't start with an upper case letter
The method name it.superbudget.jfcExample.Show() doesn't start with a lower case letter
Possible null pointer dereference of formatter in new it.superbudget.gui.BudgetEntryDialog(JFrame, Budget, BudgetEntry, boolean) on exception path
Invocation of toString on String.split(String) in new it.superbudget.gui.BudgetPanel(JFrame, Budget)
it.superbudget.gui.SplashScreen$SplashScreenTask stored into non-transient field SplashScreen.worker
it.superbudget.gui.SplashScreen$SplashScreenTask.done() invokes System.exit(...), which shuts down the entire virtual machine
it.superbudget.gui.SplashScreen$SplashScreenTask.doInBackground() invokes inefficient new Integer(int) constructor; use Integer.valueOf(int) instead
it.superbudget.persistence.dao.BudgetEntryDao.getBudgetEntry(Long, BudgetEntryTypes, Date, Date) may fail to close PreparedStatement
it.superbudget.persistence.entities.BudgetEntry.getDate() may expose internal representation by returning BudgetEntry.date

new it.superbudget.persistence.entities.BudgetEntry(BigDecimal, Category, SubCategory, Date, Budget, Integer, String, Recurrence) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into BudgetEntry.date
it.superbudget.persistence.entities.BudgetEntry.setDate(Date) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into BudgetEntry.date
it.superbudget.persistence.entities.BudgetEntryView.getDate() may expose internal representation by returning BudgetEntryView.date
it.superbudget.persistence.entities.BudgetEntryView.setDate(Date) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into BudgetEntryView.date
Class it.superbudget.persistence.entities.BudgetEntryView defines non-transient non-serializable instance field subCategory
Class it.superbudget.persistence.entities.Category defines non-transient non-serializable instance field subCategories
it.superbudget.util.bundles.ResourcesBundlesUtil.LABEL_BUNDLE_FILE_NAME isn't final but should be
it.superbudget.util.bundles.ResourcesBundlesUtil.VERSION_FILE_NAME isn't final but should be
it.superbudget.util.bundles.ResourcesBundlesUtil.VERSION_PROPERTY_NAME isn't final but should be
